评论概述: Nicer Than I Thought It Would Be
评论详情: The fabric of the bohorose blue is vibrant and exactly as pictured. Although the "stripe" on the sides looks almost black in the pic, it's actually navy. I'm 5'7", 160 lbs, and purchased One Size. My waist is 22", and the elastic feels snug, but not uncomfortably tight. The length of the skirt would allow me to push it down on my (42") hips without having it touch the ground, but the waist isn't wide enough to do that comfortably. The fabric feels slightly stiff, but I have enough experience with rayon skirts to know that's temporary. I never expected the quality of the skirt to be good, and I'm pleasantly surprised! Already looking at other colors.
